oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Ralph Martin Interview
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Martin, Ralph; Vietnam War, 1961-1975
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Ralph Martin enlisted in the U.S. Air Force and served in-country from October 1972 to January 1973, when a ceasefire was enacted. He was a weapons and munitions specialist, stationed in Thailand, about 100 miles from the Laotian border.
